sentences.en: A lot of suspicion fell on her.
sentences.cn: 众多疑点落在了她的身上。

sentences.en: Displays of emotion are regarded with suspicion.
sentences.cn: 情感的流露会招致猜疑。

sentences.en: Forensic evidence points the finger of suspicion firmly at him.
sentences.cn: 法医的证据将怀疑的矛头明确地指向了他。

sentences.en: He managed to avert suspicion.
sentences.cn: 他设法避嫌.

sentences.en: He was arrested on suspicion of driving under the influence of alcohol.
sentences.cn: 他因涉嫌酒后驾驶被捕。

sentences.en: He was examined on ( the ) suspicion of being an enemy agent.
sentences.cn: 他因敌特嫌疑而受审查.

sentences.en: His conduct roused the suspicion of the police.
sentences.cn: 他的举动引起了警察的怀疑。

sentences.en: I can’t say for definite who did it, but I certainly have my suspicions .
sentences.cn: 我不能确切说是谁干的，但我肯定有怀疑的对象。

sentences.en: I could see the faintest suspicion of a tear in her eyes.
sentences.cn: 我看到她眼中隐约有泪光。

sentences.en: I have a sneaking suspicion that they are going to succeed.
sentences.cn: 我隐隐觉得他们恐怕要成功了。

sentences.en: I regard his behavior with suspicion.
sentences.cn: 我对他的行为感到怀疑.

sentences.en: I wondered how I could leave early without arousing anyone’s suspicions .
sentences.cn: 我不知道怎么才能早点离开而又不引起别人的怀疑。

sentences.en: I wondered how I could leave early without arousing anyone’s suspicions.
sentences.cn: 我不知道怎么才能早点离开而又不引起别人的怀疑。

sentences.en: Police suspicions were confirmed when the stolen property was found in his flat.
sentences.cn: 失窃物品在他公寓里找到，警方的怀疑得到了证实。

sentences.en: Such secrecy breeds and encourages fear and suspicion.
sentences.cn: 如此保密的做法滋生并加剧了人们的恐惧和疑虑。

sentences.en: Suspicion and jealousy, however ill-founded, can poison a marriage.
sentences.cn: 怀疑和忌妒，不管多么站不住脚，都可能毒害婚姻。

sentences.en: The men were pulled in on suspicion of having committed a burglary.
sentences.cn: 这些人因涉嫌犯有夜盗罪而被拘留.

sentences.en: The police booked him for suspicion of robbery.
sentences.cn: 警方把他作为盗窃嫌疑犯登记入册。

sentences.en: There was suspicion and even downright hatred between them.
sentences.cn: 他们之间相互怀疑甚至极度仇恨。

sentences.en: They drove away slowly to avoid arousing suspicion.
sentences.cn: 他们缓缓驾车离去，以免引起怀疑。

sentences.en: We need to back that suspicion up with statistical proof.
sentences.cn: 我们需要用统计数据来证实那一猜测。

sentences.en: Whitlock silently cursed Graham for heaping more suspicion on him.
sentences.cn: 惠特洛克心里默默地诅咒格雷厄姆，因为他让自己备受猜疑。

words.tran_cn: 怀疑（suspect的过去分词和过去式）

trans.tran_cn: 怀疑，嫌疑，疑心，〈口〉一点儿
trans.tran_en: a feeling you have that someone is probably guilty of doing something wrong or dishonest
